activities.details: CEO, Founder, and designer, Romikas (Retail jewelry business)
activities.description: Propel marketing, designing & blogging strategies for business, gain over
activities.additional_info_c: 5,000 customers in 3 years, I have worked on every aspect of my business from writing blogs to taking product pictures. Also have spent many hours create Social Media content on platforms like Tik-Tok and Instagram to raise sales, donate 10% of monthly sales to charities like GiveIndia to provide oxygen tanks to India during the pandemic, to those in India that did not have them during the Pandemic, Also donate 10% of sales to the Trevor Project, an LGBTQ+ hotline [a][b][c]
activities.additional_info_h: I intend to participate in a similar activity in college (Yes/No): Yes

activities.description: Teach over 200 students Abacus Math, lead students to win Speedy Math State
activities.additional_info_c: Math Competition, being able to help students grow their confidence and speak up in a safe environment[f]. I created lasting relationships with my students and still am in contact with them. Taught for free for a month and raised over $1,000 to donate to Ukrainian children.
activities.additional_info_h: I intend to participate in a similar activity in college (Yes/No): Yes
